attributes.title: Terrible. TAKE IT DOWN!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.title: Awful app. Needs to be taken down.
attributes.review: This app took forever to download, a week to be exact. I opened it kept kicking me out of the app. When it did finally work my phone began to glitch and lag. Adds for disgusting products (u know what I mean) began to pop up. I tired to re-download it and random music began to play while I was on the app. Disgusting. I would rate it a 0 star if I could.
